member.name: CharacterRange.CharacterRange
member.summary: Creates a CharacterRange.CharacterRange object and initializes the data members to the values specified.
member.param: Integer that specifies the first position of this range. For example, iffirst is set to 0, then the first position of this range is position 0 in the string.
Integer that specifies the number of positions in this range.

member.name: CharacterRange.CharacterRange
member.summary: Creates a CharacterRange.CharacterRange object with the data members set to zero.
